text: Gongyi railway station () is a station on Longhai railway in Gongyi, Zhengzhou, Henan. ==History== The station was established in 1908 together with the Kaifeng-Luoyang section of Longhai railway. ==See also== * Gongyi South railway station ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Railway stations in Zhengzhou Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1908
title: Gongyi railway station
